titles.title: Iris Scan Security Act of 2003
To provide grants to law enforcement agencies to use iris scanning technology to conduct background checks on individuals who want to purchase guns.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 3/11/2003--Introduced. Iris Scan Security Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Attorney General to award grants to law enforcement agencies to use iris scanning technology to conduct background checks on individuals who want to purchase guns.
